analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CurrentCrowdsale.burnUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#784-789):
	External calls:
	- token.burnFromIco() (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#785-788)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensRemainingIco (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#789)

CurrentCrowdsale.CurrentCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#542-581) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromIco(_foundersWallet,RESERVED_TOKENS_FOUNDERS) (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#573-575)
	-token.transferFromIco(_operationalExpensesWallet,RESERVED_TOKENS_OPERATIONAL_EXPENSES) (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#576-577)

CurrentCrowdsale.sellTokensIco (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#678-721) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromIco(msg.sender,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#717)

CurrentCrowdsale.distributeTokensPreIco (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#748-781) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromIco(getPreIcoInvestor(i),tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#769-773)

CurrentCrowdsale.distributeTokensPreIco has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFromIco(getPreIcoInvestor(i),tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x037213960f5fec272c05dda062c23b828de39445.sol#769-773)
